answers.answer: Have you been tested for hypoglycemia or diabetes. Sometimes these conditions can cause the fatigue, food allergies can also be related to blood sugar issues as all are connected to the function of the adrenal glands. I would ask for some more tests if I were you.

question: After eating a meal, I become extremely fatigued soon afterwards. To the point that it is interrupting my life. I also have chronic floating stools if that means anything. I am able to maintain weight and/or gain weight. I have an allergy to soy and I avoid foods with soy. I don't have Celiac because I had taken two blood tests and have attempted a few weeks of an elimination diet. My general blood test came back normal, a slightly elevated bilirubin was the only thing .
title: Can someone give me some insight?
